backend/main.mo: Motoko actor combining access control, user approval, and profile storage with admin/user permission checks for approval and profile actions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for build and feature tracking purposes.
frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY_RUNBOOK.md: Runbook explaining how to retry deployments, including steps, common issues, and troubleshooting guidance.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app component handling session-based routing for login, admin panel, and user dashboard with theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Action: Reusable gradient action tile component with size variants and icon/label display for dashboards.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/dashbo: Centralized Tailwind class constants for consistent KPI and dashboard border styling.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Confirm: Configurable confirmation dialog using alert-dialog components with customizable text and variants.
Helper wrapper for Sonner toast notifications with success, error, and info shorthand functions.
Wraps the app in a shell with header, logout button, footer, and a logout confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomShe: Provides a mobile-style bottom sheet with backdrop, close button, and scroll-locked body behavior.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Renders settings and support/chat buttons for the dashboard footer.
Centers content inside a framed mobile-style container with a fixed full-height layout.
frontend/src/components/layout/PopupModa: Displays a fullscreen modal with backdrop, close button, and scroll-locked content.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Main admin panel managing active views, logout flow, and rendering dashboard sections within a frame.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Bottom navigation bar for switching between admin views with icons and labels.
Grid-based menu mapping admin views to action tiles with icons, gradients, and navigation handlers.
Layout wrapper for admin subpages with fixed header, optional back button, content container, and footer.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/a: Defines AdminView type, navigation item interface, and the list of admin navigation items.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Loads account data and displays KPI-style summary cards for income, expense, and due amounts.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/App: Manages pending user registrations, allowing approval with duplicate checks and initializing accounts, or rejecting requests.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Com: Handles adding company financial reports and displaying sorted taken and due report history.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Fin: Loads workers and account data to display each worker’s bill, cost, and final balance.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Nas: Allows recording shared snack expenses, updates worker cost balances, and manages deletions from history.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pay: Records payment or loan entries split across workers, updates account costs, and supports deleting past entries.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pro: Adds production entries with quantities and rates, updates workers’ bill totals, and supports history deletion.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Set: Thin wrapper that renders the SystemSettingsSection component.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Sys: Renders system settings tabs for branding, labels, notices, admin settings, and section configuration.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Use: Wraps and displays the ApprovalsSection for handling user approval requests.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Wor: Allows adding, removing, and configuring workers and their single/double rates with persistent storage.
Manages worker job entries, calculates amounts using stored rates, updates accounts, and maintains editable work history.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginView.tsx: Handles user login with branding visuals, input validation, error handling, and optional navigation to registration.
Processes new user registration requests, checks for duplicates, assigns IDs, stores pending requests, and transitions back to login.
frontend/src/features/support/SupportVie: Displays support messaging for users and admins, loading threads and allowing sending messages. Admins can view all threads while users see only their own thread.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Cl: Shows a live digital clock and date, updating every second. Renders time in 12-hour format with styled UI.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Us: Displays KPI summary cards showing total due, total work, and total cost. Uses dashboard overrides for customizable labels.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Nasta: Loads and displays the user's nasta expense history with total calculation. Filters entries by user involvement and shows loading and empty states.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Payme: Displays user loan/payment history filtered from stored records, showing per-entry amounts and totals. Supports loading state and back navigation.
frontend/src/features/user/production/pr: Aggregates stored production entries by worker, initializing all workers and summing their totals.
frontend/src/features/user/production/Pr: Shows production summaries aggregated by worker, including totals for double, single, and earnings. Also displays grand totals across all workers.
frontend/src/features/user/production/wo: Normalizes a work entry's worker name fields into a fallback-safe array of names.
frontend/src/features/user/profile/Profi: Profile settings page allowing photo upload, name editing, and password changes using session data and local storage.
frontend/src/features/user/UserDashboard: Main user dashboard handling navigation between views such as production, work, payment, nasta, profile, and support. Loads user stats and profile data and manages logout and modal rendering.
frontend/src/features/user/work/WorkHist: Loads and displays a user's filtered work history with totals for single, double, and earnings.
frontend/src/features/work/workAmount.ts: Computes per-user or group total amounts for work entries using details or fallback rate data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranding.ts: Reads, listens for updates to, and updates branding settings stored locally.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardOverrides: Loads and reacts to dashboard override updates, providing a helper for fetching override labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Implements simple hash-based routing with state updates on hash changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity state, login, and logout handling using AuthClient with persisted identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserNotice.ts: Loads and listens for changes to user notice configuration from local storage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, light/dark theme CSS variables, utility classes, gradients, animations, and accessibility styles.
frontend/src/lib/branding/brandingStorag: Handles saving/loading branding settings from localStorage and provides fallback logo URLs.
frontend/src/lib/storage/adminCredential: Stores, retrieves, validates, and updates admin username/password using safe storage helpers.
frontend/src/lib/storage/companyReportSt: Manages CRUD operations for company report entries in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/dashboardOverri: Stores dashboard label overrides and dispatches update events for live UI changes.
frontend/src/lib/storage/noticeStorage.t: Loads and saves scrolling notice configuration for user dashboards.
frontend/src/lib/storage/safeStorage.ts: Provides safe wrappers for localStorage with JSON parsing and array normalization utilities.
frontend/src/lib/storage/storageSchema.t: Ensures storage schema versioning by clearing legacy keys and marking migration completion.
frontend/src/lib/storage/supportMessagin: Maintains support message threads, allowing adding messages and retrieving per-user threads.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userIdStorage.t: Assigns and maintains stable auto-generated user IDs for approved users and retrieves IDs.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userProfileStor: Stores, retrieves, and removes per-user profile photo data URLs in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with query client and identity provider, loading global styles.
frontend/src/state/session/SessionProvid: Manages session state, login/logout logic, user ID assignment, and profile updates.
Defines TypeScript interfaces for session state, login results, users, and requests.
frontend/src/state/session/useSession.ts: Provides a hook to access the session context with required provider enforcement.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters from query or hash, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend with extended design tokens.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, current feature implementations, issues, and pending enhancement requests for UI and production workflows.
